attributes.action: learn how to count up to 10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was recently browsing checkyourself.org.uk and partook in the sex quiz on said website, when I reached question two i encountered a despicable in which there was an obvious lack of time and effort and undoubtedly education put into it.  The question was as follows:

Q 2: Which of these infections can be passed on by oral sex?

Chlamydia

Gonorrhoea

Herpes

All four


I think you can spot the error.  If not learn to count.

I am disappointed with our government due to this elementary error and i will be on the look out for others of this type in the future.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
